Description: Specifies [additional command line options](https://dev.mysql.com/doc/refman/8.4/en/server-options.html) that are not otherwise set by AMP. Use with care. Alternatively, specify the equivalent under "Options File Settings"

Specifies [options file settings](https://dev.mysql.com/doc/refman/8.4/en/option-files.html) to include in 'my.cnf' that are not otherwise set by AMP. One setting per line, including the option group heading
